danfulea.misc.graphics3d

Class SpurGear

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Group
          • javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup
            • danfulea.misc.graphics3d.Gear
              • danfulea.misc.graphics3d.SpurGear
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpurGearThinBody

    public class SpurGear
extends Gear
    Class for visualize a 3D SpurGear. It is based on old java3D tutorials freely available on the web (at that time).
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 12 MAY. 2005

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpurGear

        SpurGear(int toothCount,
         float pitchCircleRadius,
         float addendum,
         float dedendum,
         float toothToValleyAngleRatio)
        Internal constructor for SpurGear, used by subclasses to establish SpurGear's required state.
        Parameters:
        toothCount - number of teeth
        pitchCircleRadius - radius at center of teeth
        addendum - distance from pitch circle to top of teeth
        dedendum - distance from pitch circle to root of teeth
        toothToValleyAngleRatio - the ratio of the angle subtended by the tooth to the angle subtended by the valley (must be less or equal than .25)

      • SpurGear

        public SpurGear(int toothCount,
                float pitchCircleRadius,
                float shaftRadius,
                float addendum,
                float dedendum,
                float gearThickness)
        Construct a SpurGear;
        Parameters:
        toothCount - number of teeth
        pitchCircleRadius - radius at center of teeth
        shaftRadius - radius of hole at center
        addendum - distance from pitch circle to top of teeth
        dedendum - distance from pitch circle to root of teeth
        gearThickness - thickness of the gear

                float pitchCircleRadius,
                float shaftRadius,
                float addendum,
                float dedendum,
                float gearThickness,
                float toothTipThickness,
                float toothToValleyAngleRatio,
                javax.media.j3d.Appearance look)
        Construct a SpurGear;
        Parameters:
        toothCount - number of teeth
        pitchCircleRadius - radius at center of teeth
        shaftRadius - radius of hole at center
        addendum - distance from pitch circle to top of teeth
        dedendum - distance from pitch circle to root of teeth
        gearThickness - thickness of the gear
        toothTipThickness - thickness of the tip of the tooth
        toothToValleyAngleRatio - the ratio of the angle subtended by the tooth to the angle subtended by the valley (must be less or equal to .25)
        look - the gear's appearance object

      • addTeeth

        void addTeeth(float pitchCircleRadius,
              float rootRadius,
              float outsideRadius,
              float gearThickness,
              float toothTipThickness,
              float toothToValleyAngleRatio,
              javax.media.j3d.Appearance look)
        Construct a SpurGear's teeth by adding the teeth shape nodes
        Parameters:
        pitchCircleRadius - radius at center of teeth
        rootRadius - distance from pitch circle to top of teeth
        outsideRadius - distance from pitch circle to root of teeth
        gearThickness - thickness of the gear
        toothTipThickness - thickness of the tip of the tooth
        toothToValleyAngleRatio - the ratio of the angle subtended by the tooth to the angle subtended by the valley (must be less or equal than .25)
        look - the gear's appearance object
